hoardr
  • Reference
  • Articles
  • News

hoardr class

hoardr class

Arguments

path
(character) a path to cache files in. required
type
(character) type of cache. One of user_cache_dir (default), user_log_dir, user_data_dir, user_config_dir, site_data_dir, site_config_dir. required

Details

Methods

cache_path_get()
Get the cache path
cache_path_set()
Set the cache path
list()
List files in the directory (full file paths)
mkdir()
Make the directory if doesn't exist already
delete()
Delete files by name
delete_all()
Delete all files - force (FALSE as default)
details()
Get file details
keys()
Get SHA keys for all files
key()
Get a SHA keys for a single file
files()
Get all files as HoardFile objects
compress()
Compress files into a zip file - leaving only the zip file
uncompress()
Uncompress all files and remove zip file

Examples

(x <- hoard())
#> <hoard> 
#>   path: 
#>   cache path: 
x$cache_path_set("foobar")
#> [1] "/Users/sacmac/Library/Caches/foobar"
x
#> <hoard> 
#>   path: foobar
#>   cache path: /Users/sacmac/Library/Caches/foobar
x$path
#> [1] "foobar"
x$cache_path_get()
#> [1] "/Users/sacmac/Library/Caches/foobar"

# make the directory if doesn't exist already
x$mkdir()

# list files in dir
x$list()
#> character(0)
cat(1:10000L, file = file.path(x$cache_path_get(), "foo.txt"))
x$list()
#> [1] "/Users/sacmac/Library/Caches/foobar/foo.txt"

# cache details
x$details()
#> <cached files>
#>   directory: /Users/sacmac/Library/Caches/foobar
#> 
#>   file: /foo.txt
#>   size: 0.049 mb
#> 

# delete files by name - we prepend the base path for you
x$delete("foo.txt")
x$list()
#> character(0)
x$details()
#> <cached files>
#>   directory: /Users/sacmac/Library/Caches/foobar
#> 

# delete all files
cat("one\ntwo\nthree", file = file.path(x$cache_path_get(), "foo.txt"))
cat("asdfasdf asd fasdf", file = file.path(x$cache_path_get(), "bar.txt"))
x$delete_all()
x$list()
#> character(0)

# make/get a key for a file
cat(1:10000L, file = file.path(x$cache_path_get(), "foo.txt"))
x$keys()
#> [1] "2a88e691a18d70a12a0b08ead7dc2c37"
x$key(x$list()[1])
#> [1] "2a88e691a18d70a12a0b08ead7dc2c37"

# as files
Map(function(z) z$exists(), x$files())
#> [[1]]
#> [1] TRUE
#> 

# compress and uncompress
x$compress()
#> compressed!
x$uncompress()
#> uncompressed!

# reset cache path
x$cache_path_set("stuffthings")
#> [1] "/Users/sacmac/Library/Caches/stuffthings"
x
#> <hoard> 
#>   path: stuffthings
#>   cache path: /Users/sacmac/Library/Caches/stuffthings
x$cache_path_get()
#> [1] "/Users/sacmac/Library/Caches/stuffthings"
x$list()
#> character(0)
